name: 100M/328FT OM3/OM4 LC to LC Outdoor Armored Fiber Optic Patch Cable, Multimode Duplex 50/125μm, 10Gb/40Gb/100Gb, Industrial TPU Jacket, Direct Burial, Uniboot, MMF, OD 5mm, Pulling Eye Kit Installed
short_description: 【Rugged Outdoor-Grade TPU Jacket】This armored fiber optic cable features a thick industrial TPU jacket with excellent tensile strength, UV resistance, abrasion protection, and waterproof performance. Built for long-term reliability in harsh environments like snowfields, deserts, mountain ridges, tunnels, coastal zones, rooftops, factories, roadside trenches, and construction sites. Supports direct burial, conduit routing, or overhead use. Available in 5m to 300m lengths for residential and commercial deployments.

【Dual Armored Construction for Protection】Built with a stainless steel spiral armor tube and inner fiberglass yarns, this outdoor fiber cable provides double-layer mechanical protection against crushing, rodent chewing, sharp bending, and pulling stress. With an outer diameter of 5.0mm, it offers significantly more resistance to physical damage than standard 3.0mm fiber cables, making it ideal for direct burial, industrial campuses, outdoor conduits, and environments with heavy foot or vehicle traffic. Engineered for long-term durability in harsh conditions.

【Pre-Installed Pulling Eye for Easy Deployment】The cable comes pre-terminated with a swivel pulling eye kit on one end, allowing for efficient and safe pulling through conduits, ducts, bridge trays, risers, telecom manholes, and underground raceways. It eliminates the risk of fiber damage during long-distance installations. The pulling eye cover is removable and reusable, making it ideal for multi-phase construction, structured cabling, building backbone links, outdoor trench routing, industrial campuses, and FTTH deployments across large properties.

【OM3/OM4 High-Speed Transmission up to 100Gbps】This armored fiber optic cable uses 50/125μm multimode fiber to support high-speed Ethernet connectivity. At 850nm wavelength, OM3 supports 10Gbps up to 300m, 40Gbps up to 100m, and 100Gbps up to 70m; OM4 extends these distances to 400m, 150m, and 100m respectively. Ideal for data center backbones, enterprise LANs, telecom rooms, FTTH deployments, server farms, campus networks, SAN/NAS storage interconnects, broadcast studios, control systems, surveillance backhauls, and other high-density, high-bandwidth fiber optic infrastructure.

【Space-Saving Uniboot & Broad Device Compatibility】LC uniboot connectors reduce cable clutter and enable quick polarity reversal—ideal for dense patching environments. This cable supports 1G/10G/25G/40G/100G SFP/SFP+/XFP/QSFP+ modules, and integrates smoothly with Ethernet switches, routers, firewalls, ONU/OLT terminals, media converters, patch panels, NICs, NVR systems, fiber mux/demux units, and industrial control equipment. Compatible with Cisco, Ubiquiti, Mikrotik, Juniper, HPE, Arista, TP-Link, Netgear, Intel, Fortinet, Zyxel, Mellanox, Supermicro, Huawei, ZTE, Brocade, D-Link, and others.
product_description: The 100m (328ft) LC to LC Outdoor Armored Fiber Optic Patch Cable is purpose-built for high-bandwidth transmission and complex routing in harsh environments. Featuring bend-insensitive OM3/OM4 multimode fiber and dual-layer mechanical protection, it delivers dependable performance in mission-critical deployments such as data centers, telecom rooms, and FTTH networks. Enhanced Engineering Features: - 5mm vs 3mm Durability: The 5.0mm OD cable offers superior crush resistance and tensile strength compared to 3.0mm standard cables, ensuring longer lifespan and stability in industrial or buried installations. - Waterproof & Crush-Resistant: Designed to withstand up to 3000N of crush force and long-term tension of 200N, the cable resists water ingress and external pressure—ideal for underground and conduit environments. - Optimized for Conduit Pulling: With a pre-installed pulling eye, the cable supports secure, damage-free routing through long conduits, floors, risers, and bridge trays—reducing installation time and cost. 5 Key Innovations: - Streamlined Deployment: Unlike conventional jumpers, ERSTICKT’s pre-installed pulling eye cuts labor by up to 40% in complex routes like vertical risers and outdoor conduits. - TPU Jacket Longevity: Industrial TPU outer jacket resists UV, salt fog, and thermal aging—retains flexibility even after 20 years in sun, snow, or coastal humidity. - Double Armor Impact Protection: Built-in stainless steel spiral tube + fiberglass yarns guard against rodent bites and foot traffic pressure. - Eco-Friendly Reusability: Pulling eye is removable and reusable—supports sustainable, low-waste deployments. - Uniboot Flexibility: LC Uniboot duplex connectors allow tool-free polarity reversal, ideal for rack management and modular upgrades. OM3/OM4 Transmission Distances: - OM3: 10Gbps @ 300m, 40Gbps @ 100m - OM4: 10Gbps @ 400m, 40Gbps @ 150m, 100Gbps @ 100m Technical Specifications: - Connector Type: LC to LC (Uniboot, UPC polish) - Fiber Type: OM3/OM4 Multimode, 50/125μm, bend-insensitive - Insertion Loss: ≤0.3dB (≤100m), ≤0.6dB (100–200m), ≤0.9dB (200–300m) - Return Loss: ≥55dB - Outer Jacket: Black industrial-grade TPU, OD 5.0mm - Armor: Stainless steel spiral tube + reinforced fiberglass yarns - Tensile Strength: 200N (long term) / 600N (short term) - Crush Resistance: 2000N/3000N (long/short term) - Operating Temperature: -40°C ~ +80°C - Lengths Available: 5m (16ft) to 300m (984ft) Application Scenarios: - Data center backbone cabling & high-density patching - SAN/NAS fiber interconnects and storage networks - Telecom room fiber runs, ONU/OLT deployments - FTTH/FTTB access and fiber cabinet extensions - 4K/8K IP camera surveillance backhaul - Smart building and campus fiber links - Tunnel, bridge, and railway signaling systems - Industrial control networks, PLC fiber connectivity - Offshore wind farms, substation monitoring - Harsh outdoor sites: coastal, desert, mountaintop Device Compatibility: Compatible with Cisco, Ubiquiti UniFi, Mikrotik, HPE, Juniper, Netgear, TP-Link, Intel, Fortinet, Arista, Supermicro, Huawei, ZTE, and more. Supports SFP, SFP+, QSFP+, QSFP28, and XFP transceivers; routers, switches, ONU/OLT ports, patch panels, NICs, media converters, and DWDM/CWDM equipment. ERSTICKT armored fiber cables are engineered for high-bandwidth, long-distance, and harsh-environment deployments—ensuring performance, reliability, and sustainable installation at scale.

short_description: 📡1M(3ft), OM3 LC-LC Fiber Optic Patch Cable Multimode 10Gb is designed for high density applications in gigabit ethernet, fiber channel, local area networks, data center, premise installation, wide area networks, commercial and so on, ideal for connecting 10G SR, 10G LRM, SFP+ transceivers etc. for 10G/40G/100G Ethernet connections and is the preferred fiber specification for 10G Ethernet connections.

📡Maximum Transmission Distance - 1Gb Ethernet Distance of 550Meters at 850nm; 10Gb Ethernet Distance of 300Meters at 850nm; 40Gb Ethernet Distance of 300Meters at 850/nm; 100Gb Ethernet Distance of 200Meters at 850nm. Bandwidth is 2000 MHz·km @850nm.

FLYPROFiber has been focusing on fiber optics for 15 years. If you have any questions, please contact us promptly.

name: LC to LC OS2 Single Mode Fiber Patch Cable 10 Pack 1.5 FT,9/125μm Duplex UPC SMF Fiber Jumper Cord，OD 2.0mm Singlemode 1G/10Gb/40Gb/100G SFP/SFP+Optic Cable Lc to Lc，LSZH Jacket, Yellow
short_description: 【OS2 9/125μm Fiber Cable】Featuring an OS2 single-mode fiber core (9/125μm), it fully complies with the TIA/EIA 568-C.3 standard. It stably supports 1000BASE-LX (1G) and 10GBase-LR (10G) speeds, with ultra-long transmission distances of up to 10km at 1310nm wavelength and 40km at 1550nm wavelength. It is compatible with 10G, 10G LRM, 40G and 100G Ethernet connections, and works seamlessly with mainstream SFP/SFP+ transceivers, fiber media converters, and network interface cards. Ideal for 10G networking scenarios such as Gigabit Ethernet, Fiber Channel, LANs, data center server interconnections, and enterprise cross-floor intranets.

【Premium Materials】Equipped with UPC (Ultra Physical Contact) polishing technology, it offers insertion loss ≤0.3dB and return loss ≥50dB, with low signal attenuation (0.36dB/km to 0.22dB/km in the 1310nm-1550nm band). The blue dust-proof protective cap fits tightly over the ferrule, preventing signal interference caused by dust, and supports ≥1000 mating cycles to meet high-frequency operation and maintenance needs. The fiber core is wrapped in Aramid Yarn, with a minimum bending radius of only 7.5mm (1/4 that of standard 50μm fiber), making it perfect for dense cable environments like server racks and TC(telecommunication closets).

【Safe & Durable】The 2.0mm OD yellow LSZH (Low Smoke Zero Halogen) jacket is RoHS-compliant, operating stably in temperatures ranging from -20℃ to 70℃ (suitable for both high-temperature server rooms and low-temperature outdoor environments). The jacket has a compressive strength of ≥150N and ≥5000 wear-resistance cycles; in case of fire, it emits ≤50% smoke density and no hydrogen halide, making it suitable for commercial, industrial, and residential safety wiring requirements.

【Adjustable Clip Design】The jacket’s label ring is marked with numbers "1" and "2", and the clip features raised/recessed A/B position indicators, allowing quick identification of transmit (Tx) and receive (Rx) ends during installation and troubleshooting. The connector is secured by a clip; the adjustable clip can be split to support individual fiber line connections. No additional tools are needed for wiring in tight racks, making installation and troubleshooting more efficient than standard jumpers.

【Multiple Specifications & Versatile Scenarios】Available in multiple lengths (0.5/1.5/2/3/4/5/6/10/20/25/30/40/50/75/100 FT) and packaged in 1/5/10-piece sets, it meets diverse procurement needs (from small-batch testing to large-scale deployment). Widely used in scenarios including LANs, SANs (Storage Area Networks), Fast Ethernet, Fibre Channel, building cabling, data centers, and WANs.

【2-Year Warranty】: We provide a 2-Year warranty. If there is any quality issue, you can get a refund or replacement. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us via Amazon first. We will provide you with the best service and solution.
